symptomChecker.heading: Dog Symptom Checker!
symptomChecker.subHeading: It’s normal to be worried about your Dog, if you notice Anything Unusual!

symptom.footer: Disclaimer: This tool is intended as a guide only. It helps you to decide how quickly you should seek professional veterinary attention for your pet.

basicQues.1: Hi, please select the symptom which best describes your Dog’s condition.
basicQues.2: Hi, please select the symptom which best describes your Cat’s condition.

check.footer: If your pet symptoms are not on the website and you are in any doubt over your pet’s condition, contact your vet asap.

footer.text: Do you think your pet have this condition?

h2.1: Upload a photo or click a picture to identify a dog’s breed
h2.2: Upload a photo or click a picture to identify a cat’s breed

no.heading: We could not find any result
no.desc: Make sure the image is well lit and of a pet.
